title: Holy, Holy, Holy Lord (Sanctus)

lyrics.text:
Holy, holy holy, God of power and might, heaven and earth are full, are full of your glory.
Hosanna! Hosanna! Hosanna in the highest! Hosanna! Hosanna! Hosanna in the highest!

Blessed, blessed, blessed, blessed is the one coming in the name, the name of the Lord.
Hosanna! Hosanna! Hosanna in the highest! Hosanna! Hosanna! Hosanna in the highest!
